item.title: Printing money - hacking loyalty points
item.description: At work, we’ve all grown quite vigilant when it comes to customers trying to cheat the system. A necessary trait when working in a domain where money flows back and forth and customers are always trying to find an edge that will turn the tables. While most tend to leave this mindset at work, one colleague in particular, is always probing, trying to find cracks in the surface of everyday models.
